title: Nidalee Montage + Edit I put together in ~50 hours

embed.description: Never worked with any of these software before, so it took quite some time to get my head around them. I wasn't too happy with how short it was, but a handful of my favorite clips were with a different Nidalee skin. I'm extremely picky when it comes to these things...

body:
Hey everyone!

So I recently polished up a montage I've been working on for the past month. I have never edited before, so everything done was from learning experiences  and my constant urge to perfect things within those hours. :/ 
If you have any questions as to how I did certain things, I'd be happy to explain and maybe give a few guidelines (if I manage to have the time).
It's quite short, but the a handful of the other clips were with different skins and/or were too old to have their replays rolled again.. :(

I'm a bit proud on how most of it turned out, but there is so much more I could've done. I'd appreciate if you could drop me a like and give a bit of criticism.
Thanks!

_Prowlore_

replies.body: What is that summoner icon and how did I miss recieving it?
unique style of editing but the clips were pretty average tbh and some parts were over edited and not really needed

This is a HELL of a start....

If you want to learn a little more, feel free to shoot me an add. We'll work on something. :)

For someone who has never edited before that was absolutely amazing, I've watched over 100 different montages and never have I seen one like this. 10/10 keep it up!  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Dude you have never edited before? Serious? That clip was awesome! Loved all the after effects, especially the use of the almost panoramic views.

Threw my clicker at the subscribe button, keen to see what you can do with more practice! :)
(some nice nid game play there too son)
